turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Hi there, how can I help you?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yeah. Hi. I'd like to make an order for takeout.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Sure thing. where from?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Bella Luna.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I will.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: what size did you want?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yeah, I'd like three large pizzas.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Sorry there's a little lag. That's 3 large with what toppings?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I'd like one plain cheese pizza.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: one sausage abd pepperoni pizza and one spinach and mushroom pizza.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: anything else for you?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I would like them to be thin crust pizzas, please.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: So I have 3 large pizzas, one cheese, one sausage and pepperoni, and one mushroom and pepper pizza all with thin crust. is that right?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: That last one was mushroom and spinach.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Spinach. My mistake. So the last one is mushroom and spinach.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Right.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: That's right.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Great and your total will be $64.88.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: All right.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: It'll be ready for pickup in 30 minutes. I hope you enjoy.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Okay. Thanks a lot.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: no problem. Bye.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Bye-bye.
